name: get_character
description: Returns a <%=character%> that has the ID `unique_id`.
If there are *no* <%=character%>s with that ID, or the <%=entity%> with that `unique_id` is *not* a <%=character%>, `nil` is returned instead.

parameters.name: unique_id
parameters.desc: The ID of the <%=character%> you want to retrieve.
